challengeName: $30 Hercules Branded Destination UI Prototype Cancel Button F2F Updates
detailedRequirements: Welcome to $30 Hercules Branded Destination UI Prototype Cancel Button F2F Updates
finalSubmissionGuidelines:
Documentation Provided
prototype.zip - UI Prototype

F2F REQUIREMENTS:
Important!
- All X1 Interactive TV Screen will use Responsive solution.
- You need check and test by re-size the browser, to make sure all elements inside the page need adjusted in proper ratios.
- A user will navigate every element by TV Remote, in your prototype that will achieved by press some explained buttons via keyboard
- All text and graphics in your submissions need to be editable
- Prototype Performance is our main concern, make sure your solution fast and lightweight!
- Your prototype submission needs to be “lightweight”, minimize the amount of HTML/CSS/JS in use as these will 1need to run on the “low” processor boxes
- You must update existing SASS, DO NOT edit the CSS directly

GITLAB RULES
- GITLAB branch as Base of UI Prototype Updates: https://gitlab.com/Hercules-Pages/branded-destinations-prototype
- Post your gitlab username in challenge forum if you don't have access to our code yet.
- You must fork our repo and then work based on the specified branch, you must grant my username "lunarkid" access to your repo so that I can verify your merge request manually.  
- For the F2F Winner, you also need submit a merge request for issues you fix.
- Submit your updated prototype to O/R to let us notice your submission ready for review. And watch for any feedbacks!
- DO NOT CREATE UNNECESSARY INDENTATION/SPACE CHANGES, we need your code updates easy to track.

F2F Tasks
- Press enter on Schedule a Test Drive then modal window loaded.
- Press enter on Cancel button should do nothing
- Fix solution for both pages simple.html & thumbnails.html

BROWSER REQUIREMENTS
- IE11
- Chrome Latest Browser
- Safari Latest Browser
- Firefox Latest Browser

F2F GUIDELINES
We will review submissions as they are submitted! Pay attention to Forum activity!
We will review ALL submissions until we declare a winner based on
1) Task Requirements
2) Client is happy with how it looks/works
3) Time the solution was submitted
Please let us know if you have questions or need clarification on some things

Thank you
